Name: Pha Group
description:
A local resident in Svay Reang province, Pha, 44, is a married woman who is blessed with four dependent children, two of whom are in school, while the others are garment factory workers.

To earn a living, she grows rice and works for others for a fee, while her husband is a construction worker to add more income. This is her first loan with Kredit. Pha hopes to earn a good daily income to upgrade her standard of living and to build a new house.

In a group of four members, she is the leader. She is going to use her loan portion to buy organic fertilizer to boost her crop yields.
